name: Tile Crusher
description:
Tile Crusher is a puzzle game where the objective is to eliminate all destructible tiles with the wrecking ball. The catch is that you have a limited number of turns to clear the tiles, and if you run over a previously destroyed tile, it will be restored! Plan your movements before committing to them!

Game Features

  • 100 levels
  • Six different tile types to give your brain a workout
  • Control the ball with either the mouse, directional keys, or WASD
